name: The Bear Next Door
description:
What is it?

An odyssey of self-discovery in a world of bears, butts and bodybuilding. Defeat your inner demons and discover the true meaning of love and friendship - or don't, if that's not your cup of tea. The game has four different endings, so the level of self-discovery is really up to you.

"The Bear Next Door" is a weird-ish dark humor visual novel that takes about 20 minutes to play through. Pay what you want, or nothing.

Questionable content?

Do you find muscular bodybuilder teddy bears slathered in oil titillating? If so, this game might be erotic to you. To normal people it's just somewhat eccentric, I guess. Also includes a few naughtily worded rhyming couplets.
